transcript.title: UNKNOWN
transcript.content:
PRIME MINISTER
FOR MEDIA
1988 30 MARCH
ROYAL VISIT TO CANBERRA
The four day program for Her Majesty The Queen and His Royal
Highness the Duke of Edinburgh during their visit to the ACT
in May has been finalised.
Saturday 7 May 1988
Arrival at RAAF Base Fairbairn
Sunday 8 May 1988
Royal Commonwealth Society Ecumenical Service at
St Paul's Anglican Church, Manuka
The Queen will attend the Bicentennial Racing Club
meeting and open the Queen Elizabeth Stand
The Duke of Edinburgh will attend the Bicentennial
Carriage Driving Championships and National Harness
Show at the National Exhibition Centre
Monday 9 May 1988
amOpening of the New Parliament House
Tuesday 10 may 1988
Presentation of new Colours to the Royal Military
College, Duntroon
Cereflft~ nial Departure from RAAF Base Fairbairn
( NOTE TO NEWS EDITORS, CHIEFS OF STAFF: MEDIA ACCREDITATION
MAY BE OBTAINED BY CONTACTING THE DEPARTMENT OF THE
PRIME MINISTER AND CABINET, TELEPHONE NUMBER 71 7309) 005477
AKV J,, r
